None.Name: Wafting Spit
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit spews a slimy substance that deals 137 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 206 in total. Knocks back Small units.

None.Name: Tainted Sobering
None.Description: Activate to immediately remove all buffs from a targeted hostile unit or all debuffs from a friendly unit but Windhunter's life points will be reduced by 300. Will also revert all status effects like Freeze or Paralyze when casted on a friendly unit. Hostile units will be insensitive to all major buffs for 15 seconds. Cannot be used anymore once life points have been reduced below 300. Reusable every 20 seconds.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points.

Extra.en: The Small unit knockback on Windhunter can cause a bug to happen making small squads with 1 hp per squad member survive the splash damage of Windhunter, making them invulnerable to its attack. To counter this, attack the squad with another unit or wait with attacking the squad until they regroup after recovering from knockback.
Extra.de: The Small unit knockback on Windhunter can cause a bug to happen making small squads with 1 hp per squad member survive the splash damage of Windhunter, making them invulnerable to its attack. To counter this, attack the squad with another unit or wait with attacking the squad until they regroup after recovering from knockback.
Extra.ru: The Small unit knockback on Windhunter can cause a bug to happen making small squads with 1 hp per squad member survive the splash damage of Windhunter, making them invulnerable to its attack. To counter this, attack the squad with another unit or wait with attacking the squad until they regroup after recovering from knockback.
